pageProduct.name: Swisse Charcoal Face Wash For Men 120ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Charcoal Face Wash For Men thoroughly cleanses the skin and removes the build up of dirt and oil. Formulated with Charcoal Powder, Tea Tree Oil and Licorice Root Extract, it leaves the skin feeling clean, clear and refreshed.

Warnings

This product contains essential oils. Test prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner. Store below 28°C

Common Uses

Thoroughly cleanses the skin and removes the build up of dirt and oil

Ingredients

Water (Aqua) Glycerin (Plant Derived) Cocamidopropyl Betaine Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate Xanthan Gum Charcoal Powder Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil Vetiveria Zizanoides Root Oil Cedrus Atlantica Bark Oil Juniperus Virginiana Wood Oil Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil Abies Sibirica (Siberian Fir) Oil Mentha Spicata Herb Oil Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract Acanthopanax Senticosus (Eleuthero) Root Extract Centella Asiatica Extract Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder Sodium Glycolate Salicylic Acid Glycolic Acid Citric Acid Sodium Citrate Benzyl Alcohol Dehydroacetic Acid Alcohol

Directions

Blend a small amount between palms and massage into wet skin in a circular motion. Rinse with warm water. Recommended for use twice daily, in the morning and evening.
